name: Spirit Shift
description:
This game was originally made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 30 based on the theme 'Connected Worlds'.

You control the spirit forms of three worlds and can shift between them at any time - if the timer runs out it will shift automatically! If you dash through a wall you can jump and dash again in mid-air. Try to survive as long as possible!

Art by Cameron Moore and Tobias Cook.
Programming by Rachel Crawford and Connor Halford (RhythmLynx).
Music is "Eternal Wings" by Mokhov, found via Beatpick.com.

Made using GameMaker Studio and Photoshop. Everything was made within the 72 hours except the background music. This was the first jam for some and second for others and was the first time we'd all worked together.
